dcterms:description: The EUPPBench benchmark dataset used for post-processing ensemble weather forecasts, specifically for temperature forecasts in a sub-region of western Europe.

dcterms:description: D11 dataset consisting of 20 year re-forecasts for the years 2017 and 2018, used as the training dataset for ensemble forecast post-processing.
